column1: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) size (128, 256, 1) capture representing the head of a man aged  of 37 years old, with a sequence weighted in T2 and sagittal section, starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The section reveals the presence of: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 300.5859 mm³ and the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4092.1875 mm³.
